body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Green Haven Hotels customer service. My name is David Bennett. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Gloria Perez.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's nice to meet you, Gloria. Can you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is gloria.perez@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Next, could you please provide your phone number, emphasizing each digit separately?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. My phone number is nine eight seven, four five six, two one three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Gloria. Is there anything specific you need assistance with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling frustrated with the pricing of the hotel rooms.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Gloria. I will do my best to assist you with that. Thank you for sharing your feedback.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time. If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out again. Have a great day, Gloria.
